name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
firstNightReminder: Choose a secret phrase. Wake the Yaggababble and let them know their secret phrase.
otherNightReminder: For each time the Yaggababble said the phrase today, you may choose a player. They die.

jinxes.reason: If the Exorcist chooses the Yaggababble, the Yaggababble does not kill tonight.
